glsa.title: Wireshark: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Wireshark, the worst of which allows remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Wireshark is a network protocol analyzer formerly known as ethereal.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Wireshark. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to process a specially crafted network packet using Wireshark, possibly resulting a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Wireshark users should upgrade to the latest version:
